instructions:
Combine pineapple, oranges, banana, grapes and kiwi fruit in bowl.
Blend yogurt with lime peel and lime juice.
Gently toss with fruit and sprinkle with coconut. Serve over lettuce and garnish with fresh mint, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can DEL MONTE® Pineapple Chunks In Its Own Juice, drained
1 (15 ounce) can DEL MONTE® Mandarin Oranges, drained
1 1/2 cups low-fat vanilla yogurt or creme fraiche
1/4 cup flaked coconut or sliced almonds, lightly toasted
title: Festive Fruit Ambrosia
